name: グレート魔法大作戦
summary: Dimahoo is a medieval-themed manic shooter video game developed by 8ing/Raizing and published by Capcom for the arcades in 2000. It was released in Japan as Great Mahou Daisakusen (Japanese: グレート魔法大作戦 Hepburn: Gurēto Mahō Daisakusen, "Great Magic Armageddon"). It is a sequel to 1993's Sorcer Striker and 1994's Kingdom Grandprix. The game's soundtrack was published by Suleputer.
info:
• 中文名: 超级魔法大作战
  • 开发: Eighting/RAIZING
  • 发行: CAPCOM
  • 人物设定: 馬越嘉彦
  • 别名: Dimahoo
  • 别名: Great Mahou Daisakusen
  • 平台: ARC
  • 游戏类型: 纵版STG
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2000年1月21日
